translation: Why should we not, who clearly see the evil in the destruction of families, learn to turn away from this sin, O Janardana (Krishna)?
commentary: 1.39 How why? Not not? should be learned? By us by us? from sin from sin? From us this? to turn away to turn away? Kulakshayakritam in the destruction of families? The fault is evil? clearly seeing by those who see? Janardana O Janardana.Commentary Ignorance of law is no excuse but wanton sinful conduct is a grave crime? unworthy of us? who are wiser.
